name: Slavekini, aka Slave Leia Outfit (9mb update!)
description:
Update: 2/14/22

  • 9MB file size! (shoutouts to LuisaP!)

  • Removed chest tattoo from dataset that kept showing up in gens.

  • Mild changes to the dataset- hopefully able to do upper body only as well as full body.

  • Armlet location should more often appear only on the right side.

  • Might be a pinch less flexible than the previous version based on testing.

Lots of trial and error but finally getting the hang of LORAs.

First ever public release so be gentle!

Prompt: slavekini should be all you need to get the essentials.

This thing can do nsfw, different poses, angles, topless, bottomless, all that good stuff. Prompting "from behind" likes to make yoga pants so may have to prompt for pelvic curtain. Can also negative prompt to get rid of certain things. If using with other character loras, honestly a lot depends on the flexibility of their model. Trained on 1.5 clip 1 but works great for anime or realistic models and clip 2. Tested on AOM2, Deliberate, among others.

Optional prompts that do fun stuff: chain, bound, dress removed, bottomless, topless, leash collar, pelvic curtain
